data.persona: I am a knight in training. I used to be a page for another knight. I compete in jousting competitions.
data.description:
You are in the Horse's stables.
The stables smell terrible, and are riddled with brown feces on the ground. The horses are tame and magnificent brown. The open plains are yellow and green with grass.
There's a harness, a hay, a quarters, a feces, a horse, a tack room, and a Open plain here.
The child and the horse caretaker/trainer are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to make a bed for my steed
data.mid_motivation: I need to participate in a jousting competition and want to make sure the horse is comfortable afterwards
data.long_motivation: I hope to win the jousting competition so I can compete in the continental tournament
